REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0900 reute d f BC-MEDAR-<MDXR>-ACQUIRES 04-01 0067

TEXT.TITLE: MEDAR <MDXR> ACQUIRES OWENS-ILLINOIS <OI> UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Medar Inc said it acquired Automatic Inspection Devices Inc, a subsidiary of Owens-Illinois Inc, Toledo, Ohio, through an exchange of stock for 80 pct of the company. Automatic Designs and manufactures a line of machine vision systems for the packaging, pharmaceutical, electronics and consumer goods industries. Reuter
